metadata.Title: SiriusQuality-SoilTemperature
metadata.Extended description: Component for soil temperature dynamics in SiriusQuality. It computes daily minimum and maximum soil temperature from air temperatures, soil heat flux and a deep soil layer temperature, then updates the deep layer temperature via a running average. Optionally, it computes hourly soil surface temperature using the Parton & Logan (1981) diurnal scheme. Inputs include min/max/mean air temperature, day length, soil heat flux, and mean annual air temperature (for initialization). Key parameter: lambda_ (latent heat of vaporization).
metadata.Short description: Calculates daily min/max and optional hourly soil temperature and updates deep soil layer temperature.
